divs: Sighting DetailsI was enjoying sparklers with the kids in my neighbors back yard. Noticed a bright amber light to the south-west about 40 degrees above the horizon. Caught my eye because of its size and relative brightness. It was as bright and as large as venus would be but amber colored. There were no other lights to indicate it was an airplane. It moved rapidly from west to east across the horizon. As it moved farther away to the east the cloud cover obscured the view. Just as we lost interest and looked back to the west we noticed another one with the exact same properties. That is when I started recording. Took a few moments to get the video recording started so it was south east by the time the video starts. They did not make a sound. In the beginning of the video I was walking down the slope of the yard and around a tree to get a better view as it moved away, so the jerky motion near the tree was just me moving around. As the second object became obscured by the clouds we saw a third, again with the same properties and behavior.
